execution_plan.description: Compute per-country total order value and order count in the EU database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.country AS s1__country, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s1__sum_total, COUNT(orders.id) AS s1__order_count FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id GROUP BY customers.country;

execution_plan.description: Compute per-country total order value and order count in the US database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.country AS s2__country, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s2__sum_total, COUNT(orders.id) AS s2__order_count FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id GROUP BY customers.country;

execution_plan.description: Combine per-country totals from EU and US and compute average order value per country (sum_total / order_count).
execution_plan.query: SELECT COALESCE($step1.s1__country, $step2.s2__country) AS s3__country, (COALESCE($step1.s1__sum_total, 0) + COALESCE($step2.s2__sum_total, 0)) / NULLIF((COALESCE($step1.s1__order_count, 0) + COALESCE($step2.s2__order_count, 0)), 0) AS s3__avg_order_value FROM (SELECT 1) AS _dummy;
